
Simple Tag
.
$$$ iframe
{
  "src":"https://cabloy.com"
}
$$$
.
<div><iframe src="https://cabloy.com"></iframe></div>
.


Ending marker could be longer
.
$$$$$ name $$$$$
  hello world
$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$
.
<div><iframe src="https://cabloy.com"></iframe></div>
.


They should terminate paragraphs
.
blah blah
$$$ iframe
{
  "src":"https://cabloy.com"
}
$$$
.
<div><iframe src="https://cabloy.com"></iframe></div>
.
